typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Segment as string,
		Country as string,
		{ Product } as string,
		{ Discount Band } as string,
		{Units Sold} as integer,
		{ Manufacturing Price } as string,
		{ Sale Price } as float,
		{ Gross Sales } as float,
		{ Discounts } as string,
		{  Sales } as float,
		{ COGS } as float,
		{ Profit } as string,
		Date as string,
		{Month Number} as string,
		{ Month Name } as string,
		Year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmployeeData
EmployeeData split(equals(Country, 'Canada'),
	equals(Country, 'Germany'),
	disjoint: false) ~> CountryWiseFileSplit@(Canada, Germany)
CountryWiseFileSplit@Germany derive(Country = upper(Country),
		MyCountry = iif(equals(Country,'Canada'), 'CA', 'Unknown')) ~> Upper
Upper sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Germany.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		Segment,
		Country,
		{ Product },
		{ Discount Band },
		{Units Sold},
		{ Manufacturing Price },
		{ Sale Price },
		{ Gross Sales },
		{ Discounts },
		{  Sales },
		{ COGS },
		{ Profit },
		Date,
		{Month Number},
		{ Month Name },
		Year,
		MyCountry
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Germany
CountryWiseFileSplit@Canada sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Canada.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Canada
